mapper.select: select oreder_no,text_content,img_content from content where recipe_no=#{recipe_no} order by oreder_no asc
select crecipe_no from scrap_recipe where CHEF_NO=${chef_no} and RECIPE_NO=${recipe_no}
select uc.user_comment,uc.comment_no,c.nickname,c.chef_no,c.profile from user_comment uc,chef c where c.chef_no=uc.chef_no and recipe_no=#{recipe_no} order by comment_no desc
select ma.material_name,mh.amount from material_history mh,material ma where mh.material_no=ma.material_no and mh.recipe_no=#{recipe_no}

select chef_no, email, password, name, nickname, self_intro,profile, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWED_ID) as followed_count, (select count(*) from follow_HISTORY where chef_no=follow_HISTORY.FOLLOWing_ID) as following_count from chef where chef_no = #{chef_no}

SELECT r.recipebook_no, r.recipebook_name, (select count(*) from SUBSCRIPTION_HISTORY where r.recipebook_no= s.recipebook_no) as subscription_count FROM chef c JOIN subscription_history s ON c.chef_no = s.chef_no JOIN recipebook r ON r.recipebook_no = s.recipebook_no WHERE c.chef_no = #{chef_no} order by s.reg_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into scrap_recipe values( sr_seq_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{recipe_no}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from scrap_recipe where chef_no =#{userNo} and recipe_no =#{recipe_no}
mapper.select: select like_no from like_history where recipe_no= #{recipe_no} and chef_no= #{chef_no}
mapper.delete: delete from like_history where chef_no =#{chef_no} and recipe_no =#{recipe_no}
mapper.select: select OREDER_NO orderNo, text_content textContent, img_content path from content where RECIPE_NO=#{recipe_no} order by OREDER_NO
